name: LoungeflySneeuwwitje: Cosplay Strikhandtas - Merchoid Nederland
description: "Spiegel, spiegel aan de muur, wie is de eerlijkste van allemaal? alles?" Jij bent het natuurlijk, als je draagt  rond dit schattige Loungefly Snow White 85th Anniversary Cosplay Crossbody Bag. This handbag is so cute, it'll have all the woodland creatures singing your praises and helping you out with your daily adventures. Who needs seven dwarfs when you have a bag this charming?The front of the bag features two birds, framing Snow White's famous apple, because let's be real, no Snow White bag would be complete without that iconic fruit. The back of the bag is just as delightful, with a rabbit and chipmunk gathered around flowers, all underneath the words, "With a smile and a song." And a red bow handle, because even the handle has to be cute. It's all wrapped up in a bow, just like Snow White herself.But it's not just the outside of the bag that makes it a magical accessory. The coordinating inside lining features a special 85th Anniversary Collection motif of Snow White and various woodland creatures. It's the little details that make this bag so special.Of course, we can't forget the practical aspects of the bag. It's made of vegan leather (polyurethane), which means you can carry it around guilt-free. The adjustable blue shoulder straps make it easy to wear, and the debossed, embroidered, and printed details make it an officially licensed Disney product that's fit for any Disney-lover. With dimensions of 9.5" W x 7" H x 5" D, this bag is the perfect size for carrying around all of your daily necessities.So what are you waiting for? Grab your own LoungeflySneeuwwitje 85ste Verjaardag Cosplay Crossbody Tasje en breng een beetje magie  xXNUMX;in je dagelijks leven. Wie heeft er een magische spiegel nodig als je xXNUMX;een tas dit betoverend?Hier zijn enkele kenmerken van de Loungefly Snow White 85th Anniversary Cosplay Crossbody Bag:- Made of vegan leather (polyurethane)- Adjustable blue shoulder straps- Debossed, embroidered, and printed details- Coordinating inside lining with special 85th Anniversary Collection motif of Snow White and woodland creatures- Officially licensed Disney product- Dimensions: 9.5" W x 7" H x 5" D (width measured across the bottom of the handbag)Product DetailsProduct type: Crossbody BagLicense: Snow WhiteManufacturer: LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 750 gram (26 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDTB2468GTIN: 671803409095
